actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 in order to increase the number of members on the board of directors of such Authority to five and to set certain residence requirements.
short_title: Tennessee Valley Authority Act Amendments of 1979

summary.text: Tennessee Valley Authority Act Amendments of 1979 - Amends the Tennessee Valley Authority Act to increase the number of members of the board of directors to five and to require that subsequent appointments to the board shall provide three members who at the time of appointment were residents of States consuming power produced by the Tennessee Valley Authority. Increases the number of members required for a quorum to three.

titles.title: Tennessee Valley Authority Act Amendments of 1979
A bill to amend the Tennessee Valley Authority Act of 1933 in order to increase the number of members on the board of directors of such Authority to five and to set certain residence requirements.
